[[Jetix]] (until September 9, 2009) | sister names = | web = [http://disney.co.il/ disney.co.il] | sat serv 1 = [[yes (Israel)|yes]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 45 | cable serv 1 = [[HOT (Israel)|HOT]] | cable chan 1 = Channel 82 }} '''Disney Channel''' is a children's television programming brand owned by [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] broadcast in [[Israel]]. It was previously known as '''[[Fox Kids]]''' and '''[[Jetix]]'''. ==Rebrand== In [[Israel]], [[Disney Channel]] replaced [[Jetix]] in Wednesday, September 9, 2009, from 2 o'clock local
